requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: I3 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX560se or AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None
